== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
condition: no    # a condition
leader:
  description: a leadership
  type: leadership
  leader:
    description: a leader
    multi: true
    hidden:
      jinja: |
        {% if __.condition == "no" %}
        condition is no
        {% endif %}
      description: if condition is no
    mandatory: false
  follower:  # a follower
----
